top_articles.title: Hackers Targeting Cisco Unified CM Zero-Day
top_articles.summary: Cisco has released patches for CVE-2026-20045, a critical vulnerability that can be exploited for unauthenticated remote code execution.

top_articles.title: Cisco fixes Unified Communications RCE zero day exploited in attacks

top_articles.title: Microsoft releases OOB Windows updates to fix shutdown, Cloud PC bugs
top_articles.summary: Microsoft has released multiple emergency, out-of-band updates for Windows 10, Windows 11, and Windows Server to fix two issues caused by the January Patch Tuesday updates.
